articles.description: Cole Palmer says England can "finish the job" and change their lives forever by beating Spain in Sunday's Euro 2024 final.
articles.title: Euro 2024 final: England's Cole Palmer wants to 'finish the job' against Spain

articles.description: James Anderson takes two wickets in his final innings as an international bowler to help put England on course for a huge win over West Indies.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: James Anderson takes two as hosts close on big win

articles.description: Alice Capsey hits an unbeaten 67 as England clinch a tense six-wicket over New Zealand in the third T20 international to take an unassailable 3-0 lead in the five-match series.
articles.title: England vs New Zealand: Alice Capsey's unbeaten 67 helps hosts clinch T20 series

articles.description: Jasmine Paolini produces an epic fightback to defeat Donna Vekic in a thrilling semi-final and become the first Italian to ever reach the Wimbledon women's final.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Jasmine Paolini beats Donna Vekic to reach final

articles.description: Biniam Girmay sprints to his third victory on stage 12 of the Tour de France.
articles.title: Tour de France: Biniam Girmay sprints to third victory on stage 12

articles.description: Former England striker Gary Lineker says Gareth Southgate's side are on the 'brink of history' after reaching the Euro 2024 final.
articles.title: England v Spain in Euro 2024 final: England 'on brink of history', says Gary Lineker

articles.description: Manchester United are close to completing a £33.7m deal to sign Dutch striker Joshua Zirkzee from Bologna.
articles.title: Joshua Zirkzee: Manchester United close to signing Dutch striker from Bologna

articles.description: Rory McIlroy reveals "disbelief" at Keegan Bradley being appointed United States captain for the Ryder Cup.
articles.title: Ryder Cup: Rory McIlroy says Keegan Bradley getting US captaincy stunned Team Europe

articles.description: Conmebol opens an investigation into the "unacceptable" scenes in which Uruguay striker Darwin Nunez clashed with Colombia fans at the Copa America in the United States.
articles.title: Darwin Nunez: Conmebol opens investigation into 'unacceptable' brawl

articles.description: Jamie Smith says Ben Foakes has helped him with his Test debut despite replacing his Surrey team-mate as England’s wicketkeeper.
articles.title: England v West Indies: Jamie Smith says Ben Foakes has helped with Test debut
